snippet: Justin Fornal, a.k.a. Baron Ambrosia, attempts to swim the Cooper River along Camden, N.J., in his quest to highlight urban and environmental renewal for the crime-ridden city.
abstract: Justin Fornal, aka Baron Ambrosia, attempts to swim Cooper River along Camden, NJ, in his quest to highlight urban and environmental renewal for the crime-ridden city.
lead_paragraph: Justin Fornal, a.k.a. Baron Ambrosia, attempts to swim the Cooper River along Camden, N.J., in his quest to highlight urban and environmental renewal for the crime-ridden city.

headline.main: With a Forbidden Swim, Shining a Light on a City’s Verdant Waterways
headline.print_headline: With a Forbidden Swim, Shining a Light on a City’s Verdant Waterways
